data.text: There’s a deep human need to travel, to explore the world, to experience the new. Our job is to help you do that more sustainably. Read more about our commitments and join us on our most important journey! https://t.co/JKUueno1yA https://t.co/aEtv1eCD1w

@KariTikkinen @VRmatkalla @helsinki @THLorg @myllarni @mediuutiset @yleuutiset @uusisuomi @AleksiReito @tuuliel Emme ole tässä vaiheessa tekemässä muutoksia maskivaatimukseemme. Maski on pakollinen  kaikille yli 7-vuotiaille lennoillamme. Seuraamme tässä mm. Euroopan ilmailuturvallisuusviranomaisen EASA:n ohjeistusta. Arvioimme ja päivitämme terveysturvallisuuskäytäntöjämme säännöllisesti.

@JoniKoskinen10 Hei, voit tarkistaa eri kohdemaiden vaatimukset matkustusrajoituskartasta sivuillamme: https://t.co/tjmTl0UyLo Heidi / Finnair

urls.title: Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Combining Nordic design, atmosphere and hospitality, our lounges at Helsinki Airport invite you to spend a hassle-free moment before your flight. There are three lounges at Helsinki Airport – Finnair Lounge in the Schengen side and Finnair Business Lounge and Finnair Platinum Wing in the non-Schengen side of the airport.

data.text: We will re-open our Finnair Business Lounge in the non-Schengen area at Helsinki Airport on 4 Oct with limited opening hours from noon to 6 pm daily. From 1 Nov onwards, the lounge is open with full opening hours from 6 am to midnight. https://t.co/lAOoa67M3e https://t.co/bXPXOFtdpL

@VirtaEsa @FinnairSuomi @finnairnieuws @LapinMatkailu @kotimaassafi @matkailublogit @matkatarjoukset @ilmailuuutset @IlmaToim @Ilmailuliitto @hsfi @aamulehti @Kaleva_fi Hei, kyllä täytyy. Täällä lisätietoa aiheesta: https://t.co/FNFDAICvAl Heidi / Finnair

data.text: @JuhaVehmas @FinnairSuomi Elokuussa 2019 Finnair kuljetti 1 361 100 matkustajaa. Pandemia ja mm. USA:n ja Aasian tiukat matkustusrajoitukset vaikuttavat edelleen liikennelukuihimme. Heidi / Finnair

urls.title: Ota yhteyttä Finnair Plus -palveluun
urls.description: Alla olevalla lomakkeella voit ottaa yhteyttä, jos Katso myös Usein Kysytyt Kysymyksemme, josta löydät vastauksia mm. matkatavaroihin, aikatauluihin, lippujen hintoihin ja varauksen peruuttamiseen tai muuttamiseen liittyen. Mikäli haluat käyttää EU:n tietosuoja-asetuksen mukaisia rekisteröidyn oikeuksiasi (esim. tehdä tarkastuspyynnön), voit tehdä sen osoitteessa privacy.finnair.com.

data.text: @florensmacario In Business Class on European flights, we serve one of these three options depending on your flight time: a sandwich or a fresh, cold meal with bread or a three-course meal with Nordic flavours – along with a selection of beverages. https://t.co/VqX51rO3Ik
@UteliasV Alle tunnin mittainen lento. Lyhyempien lentojen lentoaika ei mahdollista tarjoilun toteuttamista. Heidi / Finnair

@UteliasV Hei, kahvi ja tee on maksullista lyhyiden lentojen economy-luokassa. Kun kahvi ja tee ovat maksullisia, voimme tarjota laadukkaamman tuotteen ja vähennämme jätteen ja hävikin määrää. Voit valita tavallisen kahvin tai cappuccinon, mustan teen tai vihreän teen. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: Business travel is gradually picking up. We are adding one more weekly frequency from Helsinki to Gothenburg. We now have ten weekly HEL-GOT frequencies. On three weekdays, we operate both morning and evening flights. The flights are available on https://t.co/WWKAxOEyod.

urls.description: Finnair flies the shortcut between Europe and Asia. Start by selecting your country and preferred language and then proceed to booking your flights.

data.text: @pellechristy @FinnairHelps Hi, our customer service is unfortunately very congested at the moment. We apologize for the delay in getting back to you. The best way to reach our customer service right now is through the chat feature on https://t.co/WWKAxOEyod. Heidi / Finnair

Safety is always our first priority. Starting today, Finnair will not be using the Afganistan airspace until further notice. This change impacts our Bangkok flights. Diverting the Afganistan airspace will slightly increase the flight time. https://t.co/em8upTv4Hp
@JanicaPilates Yes, it is! Heidi / Finnair

@WandrMe Fabric masks are a bit less efficient at protecting you than surgical masks. The infection risk onboard is indeed very small, but the wellbeing of our customers and crew is our first priority and we want to make sure everyone feels safe when they fly with us. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: The mask needs to continuously cover your nose and mouth. You can only remove it for a limited time while you’re eating or drinking. Please make sure you always wear a mask when interacting with Finnair employees, whether it’s at the airport or onboard.

data.text: Starting 16 August, we will no longer accept fabric masks on our flights. We accept surgical masks, FFP2 or FFP3 respirator masks without a valve or other valve free masks with the same standard (N95). Please remember you need to wear a mask throughout the entire journey. https://t.co/Am4SxtT1G3

data.text: This summer, many people are flying for the first time in a long while. Are you wondering about travel safety or the new arrangements at the airport? Check out our safe travel checklist! https://t.co/KUJjQ6qLE8

data.text: It was our pleasure to bring Olympic bronze medalist Matti Mattsson back home together with his coach Eetu Karvonen. Congrats to the entire Finnish Olympic team! https://t.co/p7XOAReYX7
@gabrielladriver @Marimekkoglobal Thank you! We'll give the compliments to our Finnair Kitchen staff. 🥰

France is full of underexplored gems –  from quiet vineyards to mountain passes, former railways tracks turned bike lanes to distant mountains, these are the best isolated escapes in France. https://t.co/YSuyHizgs0 https://t.co/5mFOUkKyuM

urls.title: Manage booking
urls.description: Access your flights in Manage booking and start tailoring your flight experience with Finnair!

data.text: @michaellferrera Hi Michael, we are sorry for the congestion in our customer care, our team is doing their best to answer all the requests as soon as possible. You can do changes to your booking also via https://t.co/VwJtPZJM3S /Mari

data.text: Continued improvement in the passenger traffic figures in July – we carried 213,800 passengers, which was 47.2% more than in July 2020. The number of passengers in July was 67.2% more than in June. Another strong month for cargo. https://t.co/mmJZ7NnRJY https://t.co/ercKnei6Xh
@ESBC_Vuoksenmaa @SjoenRavikeskus Hei Jorma, edellytämme edelleen maskin käyttöä lennoillamme. Täällä tarkemmin: https://t.co/6pqg8czrTA Yst. Satu/Finnair

urls.title: Pets on Finnair flights
urls.description: Information about transporting pets on Finnair flights.

data.text: @AngelaHarju Hi Angela, yes, we do carry pets in the cabin. You can find some useful tips here: https://t.co/YGwvljkmUR kind regards, Satu/Finnair
@carysp91 @FinnairHelps Hi, Finnair gift card is not personal, so you can give it to someone else or purchase flights for others as well. More info: https://t.co/AWEDH5vDyc
@haiminh Hi, sorry about the congestion in our customer care! You can find instructions here, there is also a link to a form that would need to be filled before your flight: https://t.co/hK785vAjx3

@chelseaepenney @FinnairHelps Hi Chelsey, our customer service is unfortunately very congested at the moment, I'm sorry about that. Pls see here for your options https://t.co/XtKuE3S4Ub Kind regards, Satu/Finnair

data.text: To make travel more accessible to more people, Finnair is introducing an affordable corona testing. Finnair rapid antigen test costs just 65 euros and is available from 4 August near Helsinki Airport. https://t.co/J96YpdZUkp https://t.co/b5FatQjvDf

data.text: Portugal is well known for its vibrant city life and popular beaches. This trendy corner of Europe does however also offer quieter locations especially suitable for those looking for something to feast their eyes on. https://t.co/3MBlmAz8DP https://t.co/UTnrhY5WGH

@MikkoPihkoluoma Hei, Finnairilla ei ole enää omaa koronatodistusvaatimusta Suomeen tulevilla lennoilla. Suomen maahantulovaatimukset voit tarkistaa vaikkapa tästä kartasta: https://t.co/tjmTl0UyLo Terveisin Satu/Finnair

@MikkoPihkoluoma Hei Mikko! Tuo määrä on ok mikäli se mahtuu lipputyyppisi/matkustusluokan max. käsimatkatavaran määrään ja litium-akkuja koskevat rajat eivät ylity. Täältä voit tarkistaa: https://t.co/q0ZrhezmKQ Terveisin Satu/Finnair

data.text: We’re renewing the recipe for our iconic blueberry juice drink! We’re removing the previously used grape juice concentrate - now it only contains wild, delicious blueberries. urls.title: Fly to over 100 destinations with Finnair
urls.description: Finnair flies the shorter, faster route between Europe and Asia. Modern fleet – more comfort, lower emissions. Search and book your flights today.

data.text: @Carfield76 HKG-HEL departs at 9.10 am. Flights are available at https://t.co/FE22wx9zBM
We are increasing our flights to Hong Kong! HEL-HKG flights will be operated on Wednesdays and Fridays and HKG-HEL flights on Fridays and Sundays in August. https://t.co/TyasGp9qgk

data.text: Finnair’s nr 1 sailor @arihuusela continues to fly the Finnish sailing team to Tokyo! Yesterday it was @tuulipetaja's turn to start her journey by visiting the cockpit with coach Borja Carracedo. We wish Tuuli good luck in the games! https://t.co/M97dexXB9z
@juanvalenzu1987 We're sorry that our customer care is so congested at the moment. Here you can see instructions what to do if your flight is cancelled: https://t.co/XtKuE49FLJ

urls.title: Finnair Lounges at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Combining Nordic design, atmosphere and hospitality, our lounges at Helsinki Airport invite you to spend a hassle-free moment before your flight. There are three lounges at Helsinki Airport – Finnair Lounge in the Schengen side and Finnair Business Lounge and Finnair Platinum Wing in the non-Schengen side of the airport.

data.text: We will reopen the Finnair Lounge in the Schengen area at Helsinki Airport on 25 August (5:30–23:30 daily) and open the Premium Security lane for morning peak hours (4:30–8:30 Monday– Saturday) on 26 July. https://t.co/lAOoa67M3e
